item.title: LeetCode 8: String to Integer (atoi)
item.description: Started from today I’ll post some short solutions / reports to some algorithm-ish problems. Today’s one is String to Integer (atoi) from LeetCode. This one is fairly simple so I’ll skip the algorithm analysis part. I choose this simple problem because it’s a good opportunity to try Literate Programming beyond simple config maintenance. Having spending time figuring out how to make Org Mode and Org Babel behave in the way I want, I don’t feel like that I have enough time to solve a problem harder than simple string manipulation.
